front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for a Smart Transducer Interface for Sensors and Actuators

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard introduces data formats designed to facilitate communications between Radio Frequency IDentification (RFID) systems and smart RFID tags with integral transducers (sensors and actuators). The standard defines new Transducer Electronic Data Sheet (TEDS) formats for smart RFID tags, based on the IEEE 1451 family of standards. This standard also defines a comprehensive command set for smart RFID tags.
